description: This soft sponge cake comes with a creamy and sweet center.
name: Layered Christmas Cake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 80g mixed chocolate pieces, broken, shards or pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. In a bowl, combine the flour with the baking powder and baking soda and set to one side.
In a seperate bowl, crack and beat the eggs and then combine with the vanilla, oil, milk and sugar and mix for 3 minutes.
Now fold your dry ingredients into your wet ingredients until mixed fully.
Transfer the mixture to a deep buttered cake tin and bake for 30 minutes or until cooked through.
Remove from the heat and allow to cool fully. Then slice the cake in half and set to one side.
Layer the center of the cake with the cream and jam and place the other half of the sponge on top.
Prepare the icing as per pack instructions and cover the cake, garnishing with the chocolate pieces.
